LanguageData.MF_CondensedCrystal_pwr_description: I level：25% chance to Condense strange mana Crystal II level：50% chance to Condense strange mana Crystal III level：75% chance to Condense strange mana Crystal
LanguageData.MF_CondensedCrystal_ver_description: I level：quantity of Condense+1 II level：quantity of Condense+1 III level：quantity of Condense+1
LanguageData.MF_CondensedCrystal_eff_description: Decreases the mana cost of abilities by an additional 5% per level.
